channel.title: Need 2 questions to be helped solved!
channel.description:
k first i was wondering if it is possible to change the time limit of a tele block.. Becuz when i make a tele and say [code]teleblock = true;[/code] i don't want it to be a full tele block, just for a little while, like say 2 or 3 minutes if that's possible plz explain how.
and second, i was wondering if there is some way that if you tele somehwere you can not log out for say like 2 or 3 minutes, or you can log out, but then you have to wait a few minutes to get back in. But only when they tele to that place.
plz help if you can.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 02:26:26 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Need 2 questions to be helped solved!
item.dc:creator: @cj_own_u cj own u
item.description:
@cj_own_u wrote:

k first
i was wondering if it is possible to change the time limit of a tele block… Becuz when i make a tele and say teleblock = true; i don’t want it to be a full tele block, just for a little while, like say 2 or 3 minutes if that’s possible plz explain how.

and second, i was wondering if there is some way that if you tele somehwere you can not log out for say like 2 or 3 minutes, or you can log out, but then you have to wait a few minutes to get back in. But only when they tele to that place.

plz help if you can.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 02:26:26 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
